title: Looking for a Parter to Grind into Silver or higher
body:
hi, i have been in b1 and silver promos but i can never get into silver when i solo, I'm now back in b3 and wanting to grind into silver before the end of the season. 

Requirements are: Has to be b3 or higher, can handle losing haha and is happy to play something they aren't used to

Add me: The Gingninj69 if you can help me here

replies.body:
sent you a request
IGN: Paine
